elements.name: Book the kiosk ticket through all available entry points using Payment Cards

steps.name: I am logged into the system
I am on the "Available Cards" page
I have no payment cards stored
I go to the "Journey Search" screen
search for journey using the following criteria:
accept the alert message
I should see the "Out Search Results" screen
the following labels are shown:
the "Cotswold Line Railcard savings applied" text is shown
I proceed search results to the payment screen
I should see the "Payment" screen
I select Pay by card method
add the card with the following criteria:
I should see the "Payment" screen
the "Railcard Discount" field containts "Cotswold Line Railcard" railcards
the "No booking fee" text is shown

comments.value: # Add buttons verification on Payment screen

steps.name: I click on the "Self-service ticket machine" button
I note following fields values:
I type "223" text into "CVV" field
click on the "Buy" button
I proceed to booking confirmation
I should see the "Booking Confirmation" screen
I should see the "My Tickets" screen
the following labels are shown:
I open the "Outbound" leg for the top-most visible ticket
I should see the "Booking info" screen
the page contains the following data:
I click on the "Back" button
I should see the "My Tickets" screen
I click on the "Share" button
the following labels are shown:
I should see the "Share collection reference" text is not shown
I click on the "Share trip details" text
I scroll to the "Gmail" text
I should see the "Gmail" text is shown
I click on the "Gmail" text

result.error_message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Unable to find label: 'Going to Newcastle'
	at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:41)
	at com.thetrainline.common.steps.generic.LabelActions.labelsAreShown(LabelActions.java:88)
	at âœ½.Then the following labels are shown:(booking/RegisteredKioskBooking.feature:65)

steps.name: the following labels are shown:
I scroll to the "ticket_shared.png" text
I should see the "ticket_shared.png" text is shown
